analyzed: gnyis po gdod nas med/_/de phyir gser la gser mthong ltar/_/ji bzhin

analyzed: ma nor bden mthong yin/_/mnyam nyid rang bzhin ma nges pas/_/ji ltar

analyzed: brtags pa de snang phyir/_/dngos por brtags pa yod min de/_/yod na kun

analyzed: la mthun snang rigs/_/de phyir rang sems so sor snang /_/brtags pa cig
translated: Therefore, the individual appearances of one’s own mind🔽are not established as one.🔽Since there is no single object, there is no doubt that delusion appears.

analyzed: yul cig med pas/_/'khrul pa snang bar the tshhom med/_/des na gzhan dbang

analyzed: gdod nas med/_/rtog sems 'gro ba so so sems/_/gcig na dge sdig rnam
translated: If the conceptual mind and the individual minds of beings were one,🔽the ripening of virtue and evil would be experienced by all without being done.

analyzed: smin te/_/ma spyad kun gyis myong bar rigs/_/de min yang dag don mi rung //
translated: If that were not so, it would not be the perfect meaning.

analyzed: rnam smin thun mong ma gyur phyir/_/cig min de nyid ma skyes pas/_/tha dad du
translated: Since the ripening is not common, they are not one. Since that itself is unborn,🔽it is also not suitable to be different.

analyzed: yang mi rung ste/_/gcig dang tha dad las grol ba'o/_/dngos po sna tshhogs

analyzed: brtags pa'i/_/ming las grub pa'i gtan tshhigs med/_/de phyir mtshhan nyid

analyzed: ci yang med/_/ma grub pa las yod rtogs pa/_/sgyu ma'i skyes bu shes gyur gyi/_/
translated: The realization of existence from the nonestablished is understood to be an illusory person,🔽but it is not understood by the Victorious One himself.

analyzed: rgyal ba nyid kyis mi mkhyen no/_/snang ba spyod yul ma grub phyir/_/dmigs

analyzed: pa'i shes pa yod mi rung /_/spyod yul ma skyes ye shes phyir/_/bsgom bya'i chos
translated: And the wisdom that is not born from the object of experience,🔽The reality to be meditated on is not elsewhere,

analyzed: nyid gud na med/_/sems kyi ye shes mtha' bral phyir/_/bsgom pa po yang
translated: Because the wisdom of the mind is free from extremes.🔽And where is the meditator?🔽If there is no real meditator like this,

analyzed: ga la yod/_/de ltar bsgom mkhan dngos med na/_/mi gnas mi rtog 'jug

analyzed: pa su/_/nam mkha' lta bu rang gsal ba'i/_/rang sems yo gi de lta'o/_/ci
translated: The self-mind yoga is like the sky, naturally clear.🔽If one does not think of anything at all,

analyzed: yang yid la mi byed na/_yang dag don la phebs pa'i rigs/_/lus ngag ma

analyzed: skyes gzhi med phyir/_/skyil krung smra cad kha na med/_/de bzhin sems kyang
translated: Therefore, there is no fault in sitting cross-legged and speaking.🔽Likewise, since the mind is also🔽Free from substance,

analyzed: dngos bral bas/_/rtog spangs sgom pa'i khar mi 'ong /_/de ltar rtogs pa'i

analyzed: sgom pa po/_/yal bar 'dug pa nam yang med/_/ci phyir bdag nyid de phyir
translated: Why is that? Because of that,🔽The space of self-awareness does not move from the dhātu.

analyzed: te/_/rang rig dbyings lam g.yos pa med/_/rtog pa'i mtshhan ma bzang

analyzed: ngan dang /_/ci skyes dgag par mi bya zhing /_/de don dran pas bral ba'ang
translated: and do not be separated from the mindfulness of its meaning.🔽I will explain the nature of self-arising.

analyzed: yin/_/rang byung rang bzhin ngas smra'o/_/dper na rkun mo tshhor ma thag_/

analyzed: ma skrad bros bzhin sdeng gis zhi/_/lta ba'i shugs las 'byung ba'i phyir/_/ched

analyzed: du tshhor ba rten mi dgos/_/de mi blo'i skad cig tu/_/rnam rtog rang gi de nyid

analyzed: lta/_/byis pa'i shes pa ldang mi nus/_/rmugs pas don nyid mi gsal ba'o/_/
translated: and the meaning is unclear because of dullness.🔽Do not fall under the power of dullness,

analyzed: bying rmugs rab tu bying rmugs dang /_/shin tu bying dbang du mi btang /_/de

analyzed: bzhin rgod pa'ang rnam pa gsum/_/le lo snyoms las sman la sbyor/_/dogs

original: pas gol pa lhung ba gnyis/_/re ba rtags dang 'bras bu'o/_/'khrul pa 'jug
analyzed: pas gol pa lhung ba gnyis/_/re ba rtags dang 'bras bu'o/_/'khrul pa 'jug
translated: There are two kinds of errors:

analyzed: tu mi btub dang /_/lus kyi bya byed spyod la dga'/_/ngag gi ca co smra la dga'//

analyzed: yang dag don la ring ba'i phyir/_/bya byed grong yul gtam mi glan/_/sbyin
translated: Because of being far from the true meaning, do not discuss worldly affairs,🔽such as what should be done and what should not be done,🔽and do not perform the rites of giving and taking.

analyzed: dang cho ga'i las mi bya/_/dge ba las kyang g.yeng 'gyur na/_/sdig las mi bya

original: lta ba'i rim pa yi man ngag
analyzed: lta ba'i rim pa yi man ngag
translated: The intimate instruction of the stages of the view🔽is applied to the experiences of wavering,

analyzed: smos ci dgos/_/nyams dang g.yo dang goms pa dang /_/brtan pa'i nyams

analyzed: dang sbyar bar bya/_/don du 'di nyams bstan du med/_/de rtogs yang dag

analyzed: nyams dang ldan/_/de tshhe phyi nang gsang ba'i drod/_/phyi nang rtags kyang rim
translated: and the outer and inner signs arise in stages.🔽Even if they arise, do not generate a mind of delight;

original: par 'byung /_/skyes kyang dga' brod sems ma skyed/_/med kyang de la mi
analyzed: par 'byung /_/skyes kyang dga' brod sems ma skyed/_/med kyang de la mi
translated: even if they do not arise, do not be displeased.

original: dga' med/_/de dag g.yo dang thob brtan na/_/rim 'byung gsangs na
analyzed: dga' med/_/de dag g.yo dang thob brtan na/_/rim 'byung gsangs na
translated: If they are stable, having been obtained after wavering,🔽the siddhis will quickly arise.

original: dngos grub myur/_/klungs gsum ldan pa'i skyes mchog la/_/seng ge lta bu
analyzed: dngos grub myur/_/klungs gsum ldan pa'i skyes mchog la/_/seng ge lta bu
translated: The supreme being who possesses the three skills🔽is like a lion, free of the masses of fear.🔽Without attachment to food, wealth, and relatives,

original: 'jigs tshhogs bral/_/zas dang nor gnyen ma chags shing /_/snying rje chen po
analyzed: 'jigs tshhogs bral/_/zas dang nor gnyen ma chags shing /_/snying rje chen po
translated: and with great compassion,

original: ma bral na/_/chos nyid dang yang 'phrad pa'i rtags/_/ci spyod don las ma
analyzed: ma bral na/_/chos nyid dang yang 'phrad pa'i rtags/_/ci spyod don las ma
translated: If you do not stray from the meaning of whatever you do,🔽it is a sign that you are becoming fit through familiarity.

original: nyams na/_/goms pas las su rung ba'i rtags/_/'di ldan dbang po phyed
analyzed: nyams na/_/goms pas las su rung ba'i rtags/_/'di ldan dbang po phyed
translated: If you have this, your faculties will be wide open🔽and you will not be discouraged by any appearance,

original: btshums med/_/snang ba gang yang mi skyo zhing /_/yid la bya ba med phyir ro/_/
analyzed: btshums med/_/snang ba gang yang mi skyo zhing /_/yid la bya ba med phyir ro/_/
translated: because you will not be mentally active.🔽If you attain patience in stages through your body,🔽if you are free from the eight worldly concerns,🔽and if afflictions do not arise in you at all,

original: lus kyis rim par bzod thob dang /_/tshhes brgyad spong len med pa dang /_/ gang la yang nyon mongs mi skye na/_/'di yang sa la bgrod pa'i brtags/_/
analyzed: lus kyis rim par bzod thob dang /_/tshhes brgyad spong len med pa dang /_/ gang la yang nyon mongs mi skye na/_/'di yang sa la bgrod pa'i brtags/_/
translated: this is also a sign that you are progressing on the stages.🔽Without mental activity, without blocking or producing appearances,

original: yid la byed med dgag snang med/_/'du shes ma bzung rang gsal la/_/gang
analyzed: yid la byed med dgag snang med/_/'du shes ma bzung rang gsal la/_/gang
translated: without grasping at perceptions, and with natural clarity,🔽do not practice anything at all,

original: yang nyams su mi len cing /_/sems kyis mngon par ma phyogs shing /_/
analyzed: yang nyams su mi len cing /_/sems kyis mngon par ma phyogs shing /_/
translated: and do not be drawn to anything with your mind.🔽Without reference points, everything is self-apparent;

original: dmigs med tshhul du rang snang ba/_/tha snyad tsham du sgom zhes brjod/_/yang
analyzed: dmigs med tshhul du rang snang ba/_/tha snyad tsham du sgom zhes brjod/_/yang
translated: this is called “meditation in the conventional sense.”🔽Without a basis in the utterly pure meaning,🔽you should investigate the conventional view

original: dag don gyi sdeng med par/_/tshhig tsham lta la khungs phyung zhing /_/bya med chos
analyzed: dag don gyi sdeng med par/_/tshhig tsham lta la khungs phyung zhing /_/bya med chos
translated: and be free from activity.

original: la blo gtad nas/_/rtshing chos phat ral spyod byed pa/_/rgyal ba'i bkas kyang
analyzed: la blo gtad nas/_/rtshing chos phat ral spyod byed pa/_/rgyal ba'i bkas kyang
translated: and then practice the Dharma of the dead,🔽the Victorious One’s words will not protect you,

original: mi skyob ste/_/dmyal ba'i 'bras bu the tshhom med/_/rtogs pa'i mtshhon rtogs
analyzed: mi skyob ste/_/dmyal ba'i 'bras bu the tshhom med/_/rtogs pa'i mtshhon rtogs
translated: and you will undoubtedly experience the results in the hells.🔽If you have the eight realizations,🔽you are a child of the Victorious Ones.

original: brgyad ldan na/_/skyes bu de ni rgyal ba'i sras/_/sdeng med lta ba mthong 'dod
analyzed: brgyad ldan na/_/skyes bu de ni rgyal ba'i sras/_/sdeng med lta ba mthong 'dod
translated: If you are without a protector and wish to see the view,

original: pas/_/rang gis nga rgyal snyems byed pa/_/ri bos srog chags gnan pa ltar/
analyzed: pas/_/rang gis nga rgyal snyems byed pa/_/ri bos srog chags gnan pa ltar/
translated: you will be like a creature crushed by a mountain🔽and will not be able to rise up to the peak of liberation.

original: nan yang thar pa'i khar mi 'byung /_/gsang sngags pa'i sgor zhugs nas/_/
analyzed: nan yang thar pa'i khar mi 'byung /_/gsang sngags pa'i sgor zhugs nas/_/
translated: If you have entered the door of Secret Mantra,
